caption.p: Non-structural carbohydrates and lipid contents in parts of the xylem after six months of treatment. (A–H) indicate fructose, glucose, sucrose, stachyose, arabinose, galactose, starch, and fat, respectively. Significance of statistical analysis (one-way ANOVA) shown with asterisks, * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01. “ns” indicates no significant difference at the 0.05 level. Bar represents standard deviation.
